details.body:
## Part 3 Chapter 4, Section 362 and 363 ITEPA 2003 The computation of liability will depend on the particular arrangements under which the voucher or credit-token is supplied or used. In cases of doubt it is essential to obtain or see a sample of the relevant voucher or token together with any brochure or promotional literature relating to its use. Where a voucher or credit-token has been used in a PAYE avoidance scheme see [EIM11910](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM11910.htm). The following table summarises the steps to take.
**Action** **Instructions**
Identify the type of voucher or token. You need to establish how the voucher or token is intended to be used and what the employee is able to obtain by its use. The legislation defines the following types of voucher or token:
[EIM16040](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM16040.htm)
[EIM16048](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM16048.htm)
[EIM16055](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM16055.htm)
[EIM16060](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM16060.htm) to EIM16070
[EIM16090](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM16090.htm)
[EIM16110](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM16110.htm)
Check the voucher or token has been received by, or appropriated to, the employee by reason of the employment. [EIM16120](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM16120.htm) to EIM16130
Calculate the amount of earnings and determine in which year the liability falls. [EIM16140](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM16140.htm) to EIM16160
Make any allowable deductions that are claimed. [EIM16170](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM16170.htm)
Consider whether a dispensation may be appropriate. [EIM16180](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM16180.htm)
